_header: Saint Ecgwine the holy man was here of England
Subjects: saints’ lives; Ecgwine, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Ecgwine in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Egwyne þe holy mon was here of EngelondeBisschop he was
                    of Wircetre as ich vndurstonde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu for þe loue of him lete vs here such lyf
                    ledeÞat we mote to heuene come and forȝiue vs vre misdede.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint egwine þe holiman was here of englondebischop he was of Worchestre as ich vnþerstonde…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou ihesu crist for þe loue of seint egwine lat ous such lif ledeþat we mote to heuen come & for ȝif ous our misdede
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xCv” added to left margin by later hand (f. 266v).

Digital Facsimile of British Library  Cotton Julius MS D IX.

BLEge1993.First Lines: SEint egwine þe holi mon wes hey of engelondeBisceop he was of Winchestre as icham vnderstonde…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …Now ihu vor þe loue of him lete vs such lif ledeÞat we moten to heuene come & vor ȝef vs oure misdede

BLSto949.First Lines: Seynt Egewyn þe holy man was herre of engelondeBischop he was of wurcestre as ich am vnderstonde…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …Nou ihesus for þe loue of him let vs suche lyf ledeþat we moten to heuene come & vorgiue vs our mysdede

BLAdd10626.First Lines:
Seint Egwyn þe holy man was here in englondeBischepe of
                    Wircetre he was as y vnder stonde…
BLAdd10626.Last Lines:
…Þo þey openede þis fysch in his wombe þey
                    foundeÞe keye of þe veterus þat was caste in avene
                    grounde…
